resources.string: Q1. The Pacific Ocean is larger than the Atlantic Ocean.
Q2. The Suez Canal connects the Red Sea and the Indian Ocean.
Q3. The source of the Nile River is in Egypt.
Q4. The Amazon River is the longest river in the Americas.
Q5. Lake Baikal is the world\'s oldest and deepest freshwater lake.
The Pacific Ocean is the largest body of water in the world at 166,266,877 square km. The Atlantic is the 2nd largest ocean at 86,505,603 square km .

The Red Sea (also the Erythraean Sea) is a seawater inlet of the Indian Ocean, lying between Africa and Asia. The connection to the ocean is in the south through the Bab el Mandeb strait and the Gulf of Aden.
Although the river has multiple sources, the Nile starts in Jinja, Uganda, at the shore of Lake Victoria.
Lake Baikal is 25 million years old and 1642 metres deep.
